sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Bar id="my-chart-id" :options="chartOptions" :data="chartData"></Bar>
</template>
<script>
import { Bar } from "vue-chartjs";
import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  BarElement,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
} from "chart.js";

ChartJS.register(
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  BarElement,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale
);

export default {
  name: "BarChart",
  components: { Bar },
  props: {
    completed: Number,
    notCompleted: Number,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      chartData: {
        labels: ["Completed", "Not Completed"],
        datasets: [
          {
            label: "Task Activity",
            data: [this.completed, this.notCompleted],
            backgroundColor: ["#00ff7f", "#ff6347"],
          },
        ],
      },
      chartOptions: {
        plugins: {
          legend: {
            display: false,
          },
          title: {
            display: true,
            text: "The users activity:",
          },
        },
        responsive: true,
      },
    };
  },
  methods: {},
};
</script>
<style></style>
